conclusion: Analysis of Vehicle Collision with Wooden Blocks
Looking at the sequence of images, I can analyze how a small toy vehicle (marked as 'A' in the first image) interacts with the wooden blocks on a green surface.

Blocks are grouped by color: yellow, blue, green, orange, and red.

A small toy vehicle (appears to be gray/silver) is visible in motion.
The vehicle has made contact with the stack of yellow blocks.
The impact is causing the blocks to begin moving.
The vehicle appears to be approaching from the right side.
The vehicle has passed through the scene.
The stack of yellow and orange blocks has been displaced but remains partially intact.
Some green blocks appear to have been scattered.
The arrangement of blocks has changed from the initial state.
Red blocks at the bottom remain relatively undisturbed.

conclusion: The collision appears to be partially elastic (some energy was absorbed by the blocks).

conclusion: Some blocks were deflected laterally from the direct path of the vehicle.
